gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsCurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AssetsNoncurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Assets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityAndLiabilities` SHOULD be equal to + `Assets`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetEducation_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
